query:
SELECT 
  c.name as category,
  COUNT(p.id) as product_count,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN p.imageUrl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_image,
  p.imageUrl as sample_image_url
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id
GROUP BY c.name, p.imageUrl
ORDER BY c.name, COUNT(p.id) DESC
LIMIT 20;
